task.title: People as agents
task.shortdesc: Entities extracted from MARC 100 and 700 fields.

context.p: As agents, people can contribute to creation activities or production activities. The table below summarizes the domains and properties used in activities involving person entities.
context.note: The role of the person entity is derived from $e or $4. When those subfields are absent, a generic role of creator is assigned when 100 is the source or contributor when 700 is the source.

row.entry: Include produced_by reference if the HumanMadeObject points to a VisualItem, but not a LinguisticObject.
Do not include agent references in nestedmembers_exemplified_by → HumanMadeObject.

section.title: Source data
section.codeblock: --- name: PeopleAsAgents sampleBibs: - 693 - 907221 - 7647390 # produced_by # Source data fields fieldSpec: - 100014abcdegjq - 700014abcdegjq trimPunctuation: true scriptInclusion: BOTH

step.cmd: After applying the instructions in , add an embedded reference to the person entity within the record-level resource.

substep.cmd: Process production activities (domain: HumanMadeObject → shows → VisualItem).
